【iPhone Charging Cable Nylon Braid】：The iPhone charging cable is braided from nylon material to provide extra protection and durability.The nylon braid is tightly woven and insulated,making it more durable,stronger and safer than regular iPhone charging cables,while being pliable and knot-free.Combined with a 30,000 bend life tests and 30,000+ plug life tests,it can withstand daily connection needs and long-term use

【MFi Certified Lightning Cable】: iPhone charging cord has completed the MFi certification requirements.Each cable contains an authorization chip that is 100% compatible with iPhone. MFI certified chip provide your device with the fastest speed to safely charge and syncs photos,music,videos,and files without triggering warning messages

【Massive Compatibility】：The iPhone charger cord is MFi certified and is compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8 Plus/8/7 Plus/7/Sync 6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6/5C/5/SE/iPad/iPod and more.Each lightning cable has been updated to match the iPhone iOS system

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB A To Lightning Cable 3FT Multiple Colors of iPhone Cords to Match Different Colored Devices - To Meet Your Different Needs! To increase the charging speed, we use high quality 4-core copper wire in our lightning cable. The device can charge at up to 2.4 A and transfer files at up to 480Mbps.This iPhone charger cord is made of high purity copper core and smart chip with overcharge protection, stable current protection, automatic switching and battery protection.Our lightning cable is braided with high quality material nylon, which is durable and not easy to be knotted. It is resistant to abrasion and lasts longer than ordinary cables.

Safe Charging and Efficient Transmission Fast Charge & High Speed Data Sync Automatically matches charging power. Outstanding performance allows your device to transfer data while charging simultaneously at speeds up to 480 mb/s. Charging speeds of up to 2.4A save you time and protect your device.

Multiple Details for Strong Quality Flexible & Durable This iPhone charging cable is designed with ultra-durable, premium materials for superior resistance to breakage, and a protective layer has been added to the Lightning and USB ends to increase durability and minimize wear and tear. With a bend life of over 20,000 cycles, this iPhone charger cable is durable and tangle-free for a wide range of everyday connectivity needs and long-term use. Nylon Tangle-Free Design iPhone Charger The iPhone charging cord is made of high quality nylon braid, which is not only more durable and wear-resistant, but also bring you wonderful visual experience and add color to your life. Premium nylon braid adds extra tangles with 20000+ bending life. Perfect 3 feet, enjoy the free life. Battery Protection Design To Protect Your Battery Life This iPhone lightning cable is made of high-purity four-pronged copper cores and a smart chip with overcharge protection, steady current protection, automatic switching and battery protection designed to preserve your battery life.

Multiple Colors Available -3 Colors of Lightning Cables Our iPhone Cord - Reliable Products You Can Trust:-For many years, we have specialized in producing high quality iPhone lightning cables.-Friendly customer follow-up support, so you can use our iPhone usb cable with confidence.Package Contents:1*3ft iPhone charging cord- Taro Purple1*3ft iPhone charging cable - Turquoise Blue1*3ft iPhone lightning cable - Fruit Green

In addition, the cable is easy to store and transport, making it the perfect choice for those who are always on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3-Pack of 6 foot Lightning Cables in Unique Colors
reviews.reviewText: These are USB Type A (standard USB) to Lightning Connector Cables. Apple iPhone transitioned from their previous proprietary connector to the lightning connector in 2012 with their iPhone 5. Apple has recently transitioned from Lightning Connectors to USB-C connectors with the iPhone 15. So these cables are useful for anyone using an iPhone 5 - iPhone 14 (charging, attaching for data transfer, etc.).The cables are well made and seem better built than the standard rubber-jacketed cables that come "free" with most devices you purchase. They have a nylon braided jacket like many after market cables which gives them a higher quality and more durable feel. So these are an upgrade to what most devices come with.The cables I purchased are 6 feet long, which is pretty long. For some uses, this is ideal. For other uses, having something shorter (like the available 3 foot cables) would make more sense. Certainly, these are flexible and can be folded up, so they will work in place of a shorter cable, but if you are specifically purchasing these for attachment to a portable battery charger or for connecting to your car, I would probably get something shorter than 6 foot (like the 3 foot version). 6 foot is great for attaching to wall chargers around the house.These cables are a good value for their current price. Cables can get much more expensive. So you get a quality set of cables at a good value.The unique thing about these cables are the colors. You get pink, blue, and green, so you get a variety. However, these are fairly unique "pastel" colors. I have not seen a lot of cables in these colors. My son really likes the green and blue cables (not so much the pink, but he has used it around the house). The pictures on Amazon for these cables is accurate. If you like these colors and want a quality and good value cable, these are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great replacement for your apple charger!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product as a replacement for my apple charger for my iPhone as its material is falling apart. I was a bit hesitant at first to purchase an off brand product since I was worried it would damage my phone, but I have been pleasantly surprised so far. This is a fairly standard cable and product being that it does its job; it works.In addition to it working fine, I like that it comes in three different colors as it adds a nice flair to my tech. Aside from the aesthetics, I have found the cable to be very durable and flexible which is an added bonus! I also like that it is 6 feet in length as this gives you more flexibility to use your phone from a further location while it is still charging. A great purchase overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Apple MFi Certified 3pack 6FT Lightning Cable is a vibrant addition to your charging arsenal, offering both style and substance. Available in eye-catching green, pink, and blue hues, these cables aren't just about aesthetics—they're backed by Apple's certification for quality assurance.At 6 feet in length, these cables provide ample reach without compromising on speed or efficiency. They ensure fast charging capabilities and high-speed data syncing, making them ideal companions for your iPhone 14/13/12/11 series, including the Pro Max versions, as well as XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7/Plus/6S models.The colors aren't just for show; they add a touch of personality to your tech setup while allowing easy identification among multiple cables. Whether you're coordinating with your device color or simply prefer a splash of variety, these multi-color options cater to your preferences.The cables' MFi certification guarantees compatibility and reliability, reducing the risk of overheating or device damage. They boast sturdy construction to withstand daily wear and tear, ensuring longevity despite frequent use.Overall, the Apple MFi Certified 3pack 6FT Lightning Cable delivers both style and functionality. It's a reliable choice for users seeking quality charging and syncing capabilities along with a pop of color to brighten up their tech collection.
The cables are very nice and excellent quality.

This was something I got to have chargers in bulk. They didn't work when plugged into my computer as it kept disconnecting but it worked fine in a charging cube. One of them broke within a week of using as the usb part somehow bent on the inside but they work pretty well
